Author: go_clc
Title: [ANN][ICO] GO CLC is an alternative trip ecosystem
Body: The founder of GO CLC project Konstantin Khludnev will hold a live webinar and answer your questions!  The start of broadcast at 12:00 UTC, link will be available on the site https://goclc.io and also in our Facebook group https://[Suspicious link removed]/GOclc.en   We have much news: this is the start of the private sale of our project, the launch of the bounty program, and the participation of representatives of the team in upcoming events around the world.  Here are some questions on which you will be given answers:  ‚òë What are the key benefits and financial model of the project?  ‚òë How can participants earn income?  ‚òë How do we plan to develop our project?  ‚òë What is the role of blockchain and why software solutions of the project will unite users of other blockchain?  ‚òë What is the actual maintenance and support cost of GO tokens, and also why their number could be reduced?  You can ask your questions in the dialogue. Or send questions here with the hashtag #askceo-we'll give them to Konstantin.  If you have any questions, ask us directly and receive a comprehensive answer!

Author: go_clc
Title: [ANN][ICO] GO CLC is an alternative trip ecosystem
Body: Bitcointalk is the oldest and the largest online forum dedicated to blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies.  The site appeared on the Internet in 2009, when the price of Bitcoin was only one-tenth of a cent. Since then, the price of the most well-known cryptocurrency has grown approximately about 10 million times and today is $10589 per coin.  Bitcointalk was originally created by Satoshi Nakamoto ‚Äì the "dad" of bitcoin, a person whose true identity is unknown (may be he is not a person, but a group of people who communicate under one pseudonym). By the way, Satoshi's profile on Bitcointalk can be found even today - the last time he went to his account on the 13 of December 2010 (link to his profile https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3 )   According to the forum itself, now more than 1.8 million users have registered on the site, in total all them have written about 30 million messages. Since the creation of Bitcointalk, the content on the site has received several billion of page views.  On average, 403 new users sign up every day, and the current ratio of men to women is 4:1.  The branch "Altcoin Announcement" today is the most popular topic on Bitcointalk, and then there are sections of "Bitcoin discussion" and "Altcoin discussion."  "Altcoin Ads" has become especially popular in 2017 due to the constantly growing number of ICOS and token sales that are held every week!In the branch of the forum thread you can see the section of the project GO CLC https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3023108.msg31101023#msg31101023.    We will be very glad to see all our subscribers in our section on Bitcointalk and we invite you to express your opinion and to ask questions.  http://goclc.io

Author: go_clc
Title: [ANN][ICO] GO CLC is an alternative trip ecosystem
Body: CUBO LODGE CLUB is a new generation of service in the industry of hotel business and property management  https://medium.com/@GO_clc/cubo-lodge-club-is-a-new-generation-of-service-in-the-industry-of-hotel-business-and-property-a40303d8a9b5

Author: go_clc
Title: [ANN][ICO] GO CLC is an alternative trip ecosystem
Body: For some people, traveling around the world is a cherished dream, for others flights and constant change of time zones have long become commonplace. Despite the different goals both groups have to solve similar problems-to book rooms in hotels (a measure which is not always effective), to take care in rental housing about their own safety and security of property, to worry about the skills of staff. However, very soon lots of things can change dramatically.  The emergence of decentralized networks has affected not only digital technologies but also the real economy. We are talking about mobile homes and the hotel business. The company GO CUBO LODGE CLUB LTD (hereinafter GO CLC) having studied both markets began to create a unique system of mobile homes managed by users of the virtual community.  To solve the technical side of the idea we are developing GODEX Platform ‚Äì the blockchain platform on the basis of which members will be able to track the condition of buildings, to impact on their future location, and even to lease them. A legal entity or an individual who has bought GO tokens can become a member of the CLUB ‚Äì the membership level depends on their number. At the basic budgetary level a member of the club will be able to live for free a few days per year in any country where there are CUBO houses without spending their tokens.  The development of the CLUB involves not only the use of mobile homes by its members for recreation, but also gives them the opportunity to extract profit from their membership.  You can find details abouts the ways of partnership in White Paper in the section GO CLC Solution http://goclc.io

Author: go_clc
Title: [ANN][ICO] GO CLC is an alternative trip ecosystem
Body: The development of decentralized databases has provoked the emergence of new markets and the development of established ones.  The company GO CUBO LODGE CLUB LTD (the GO CLC), has used this technology for the organization of a hotel chain consisting of mobile homes. It is planned to manage the infrastructure with the help of the CLUB which is created on the basis of the blockchain platform.  For this purpose GO CLC specialists have developed GODEX platform which will allow members of the community to communicate with each other and solve issues related to home management. Given that CLC acts as the organizer of the created  communit it would be logical if it will take on the role of CLUB Manager.  Any natural or legal person can purchase its GO tokens to join the CLUB, ‚Äì this is equivalent to the payment of membership fees. According to the rules of  the CLUB GO tokens are a symbolic currency for which it is possible to have the right to rent CUBO houses and it is made for use in the CLUB.  However, GO tokens is not only a membership card and a means of settlement, but also a highly liquid asset. Due to the fact that the creation of Go platform uses the technology Atomic Swap, the owners of the digital currency can rent it out and exchange for coins of other platforms.  Rental tokens will be popular with travel companies, which will be able to influence the location of CUBO houses, their comfort and cost based on their own needs.  In fact, it is an alternative to mining income only without electricity bills and the purchase of expensive equipment.  The lease term is set by the lessor independently but once a year ownership rights are updated. At this point, the contract can be prolonged or terminated.  Our website http://goclc.io

Title: [ANN][ICO] GO CLC is an alternative trip ecosystem

But, at the same time, regulatory and supervisory authorities of a number of countries are closely monitoring the development of the market‚Ä¶  üî∑We are focused on the long-term development of our project and are going to create an international hotel chain around the world using .... latest technologies, so the compliance with the law is vital for us to safeguard all participants of the project.  üî∑At the stage of the closed offer, we managed to attract a number of large buyers from the hotel industry for the amount of more than $ 2 million. Due to recent legislative changes in the crypto industry, we need to comply with certain formalities to close these transactions. All these actions are aimed at minimizing the risks of violation of the law, increasing the attractiveness of the project and will bring more clarity and confidence to new participants.  ‚û°Ô∏èIn this regard, we decided to postpone the start date of the public sales of GO tokens for 4 weeks. Thank you for joining us, we will keep you informed you about the development of the project.  ‚úÖhttp://goclc.io

Author: go_clc
Title: [ANN][ICO] GO CLC is an alternative trip ecosystem
Body: Often travelers who have visited a particular country come to the idea that it would not be bad to have there their own apartment or house where they will be able to return again and again. GO CUBO LODGE CLUB houses will provide you with this opportunity.  Have you ever used a car-share? Car sharing is a car rental service where access to the car you get using the app for a mobile phone. In our houses booking procedure and rental will be made the same way. A traveler will be able to choose a favorite house on the map and came to open the door from the smartphone.  We implement a subscription system that will allow its owner to use any of 2,000 houses around the world that are planned to be placed on the first stage. As a confirmation of the rights the tenant is assigned a kind of digital key(tokens) which is entered into the distributed register of records and which can not be forged. Everyone has heard about reliability, uniqueness and prospects of blockchain technology implementation in various industries today.  For sure it is worth saying about CUBO futuristic houses which remind us of star wars and fiction movies about the future.  Follow the news of our project in social networks and learn more about CUBO houses.

Author: Princess04ka
Title: [ANN][ICO] GO CLC is an alternative trip ecosystem
Body: COMFORTABLE LODGE ACCOMMODATION ALL AROUND THE WORLD AND DECENTRALIZED INFRASTRUCTURE ON THE BASE OF IOT SOLUTION WITH BLOCKCHAIN 3.0 ELEMENTS   WHAT IS GO CUBO LODGE CLUB?  GO CUBO LODGE CLUB is an alternative vocational and business trip ecosystem that tokenizes and makes available wide choice of locations for residence, flexible time occupation, anonymity, reasonable price and accommodation in modern technological lodges.    12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940 WHAT DOES CUBO OFFER?  CUBO LODGE is a movable house available for use and occupancy as a residence.  The features of CUBO LODGES: ‚Ä¢can be installed in 2 hours; ‚Ä¢assemblages does not require screws and bolts; ‚Ä¢does not sink; ‚Ä¢can withstand very low and high temperatures; ‚Ä¢withstand a strong earthquake; ‚Ä¢has solar panels for electricity generation; ‚Ä¢has a toilet / shower module; ‚Ä¢compact, light and easy transportable.      DECENTRALIZED GODEX PLATFORM   GODEX Platform is software based on Ethereum ERC20 smart contracts for registration and validation of the members of CLUB rights and usage of reservation system. GODEX Platform application will be also available on iOS and Android devices.       DESCRIPTION OF THE FUNCTIONALITY OF THE GODEX PLATFORM  Base scheme     Atomic swap scheme      INFRASTRUCTURE FOR USERS  IoT Solution Projects B2C B2B       LOCATIONS WE ARE ALREADY ABLE TO INSTALL THE CUBO LODGES IN     123456789101112131415 USA  Miami (FL) Tampa (FL) Clearwater (FL) Orlando (FL)20 Los Angeles (CA) Las Vegas (NV)   RUSSIA  Moscow Saint Petersburg Sochi Kazan 1234567 qty      30     10     20     20     40     30       qty      40     15     30     10     123456789101112131415 SPAIN  Barcelona Alicante   ITALY  Milan Rimini   TURKEY  Istanbul Kas Alanya 1234567 qty      20     50       qty      15     30       qty      10     10     40     123456789101112131415 CYPRUS  Limassol  INDONESIA  Denpasar  CHINA  Shanghai Shenzhen Sanya  HONG KONG  Hong Kong 1234567 qty      30      qty      15      qty      110     60     35      qty      30     123456789101112131415 SOUTH KOREA  Busan  MALAYSIA  Kuala Lumpur  THAILAND  Karon 123 qty  25  qty  40  qty  40    MEMBERSHIP PLANS  12345678910111213141161718192021222324 12345678910111213141161718192021222324 12345678910111213141161718192021222324   1234567891011121314116171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940 * The number of smart contracts indicated on the GODEX Platform is deemed to be initial and will grow with time. We are going to make their quantity available for the Club‚Äôs members in proportion with the tariffs. Find out more about Atomic Swap usage..  Atomic Swap BTC - GO smart contract will be available for all GODEX Platform Users. 123456789101112131415    ROAD MAP        GO TOKENS      GO Token is a symbolic value assigned by the GO CLC to membership rights solely for use in the CLUB.  Member of CLUB receives a right to rent any in-network CUBO LODGE, according to Membership Plan.  GO Token allows reserve an accommodation and get access to CUBO LODGE.  GO Token Holders may assign their rights for temporary use to other people.    MARKET AND INDUSTRY      DOCUMENTATION  123456789101112131411617181920  123456789101112131411617181920  123456789101112131411617181920    OUR TEAM  1234567891011121314151617  Konstantin Khludnev Founder, CEO    Alexander Baskakov CMO (chief marketing officer) 1234567891011121314151617  Alexei Gudkov CLO (chief legal officer), PhD candidate UAB   Xiu Lau CPO (chief procurement officer) 1234567891011121314151617  Helena Tan CQO (chief quality officer)    Tatyana Kovaleva CBDO (chief business development officer) 123456789101112131415  Alexander Strakh Smart Contract Developer    Dmitriy Dubovtsev (Hludnev) CSA (chief software architect), IoT Solution Developer
